mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, REJECT_REASON, RECOMMIT_REASON, RECOMMIT_COMMENT, ENABLED

ID,
APP_ID,
REJECT_REASON,
RECOMMIT_REASON,

ENABLED,

mapper.update:
update t_reconsider
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOMMIT_REASON = #{recommitReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOMMIT_COMMENT = #{recommitComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_reconsider set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMIT_REASON = #{recommitReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMIT_COMMENT = #{recommitComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_reconsider where APP_ID = #{appId} and ENABLED =true
